subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: After becoming the youngest helmsman to win the trophy in 2010 at age 30, James Spithill is leading Oracle Team USA again in the America’s Cup final against Team New Zealand.
snippet: After becoming the youngest helmsman to win the trophy in 2010 at age 30, James Spithill is leading Oracle Team USA again in the America’s Cup final against Team New Zealand.
